column5: Sɛ ɔbaa bi nyinsen na ɔwo banyimba a
column6: ɔno no ho nntsew araa nda esuon; dɛ mbrɛ no ho nntsew wɔ n'asabu nda no mu no."

column2: "Na da a otsia awɔtwe no wontwa ne banyinwer no twatsia."
"Na ɔnko ntandan mu adaduasa nda ebiasa wɔ n'ahoguar bɔgya mu; mma ɔnnka adzekrɔnkrɔn biara
column4: kyerɛ n'ahoguar nda ewie du ana."

column3: ɔno no ho nntsew araa adapɛn ebien
column4: dɛ n'asabu mu: na ɔnko ntandan mu adaduosia nda esia wɔ n'ahoguar bɔgya mu."

column2: "Na sɛ n'ahoguar nda no wie du
column5: ɔmfa eguambaa a oedzi afrenhyia a wɔdze bɔbɔ ɔhyew afɔr
column7: anaa atamram a wɔdze bɔbɔ bɔn ho afɔr
column8: mbra ehyiadzibuw no n'abowano mbɛma ɔsɔfo no:"

column2: "na ɔmfa mbɔ afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column3: na ɔmpata mma no; na no ho ntsew wɔ no bɔgyaagu no ho. Iyi nye mbra a ɔwɔ hɔ ma nyia ɔwo ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa."

column2: "Na sɛ ne nsa annso eguambaa do a
column3: ɔno ɔmfa ntamram ebien; kor nyɛ ɔhyew afɔr
column4: na kor so nyɛ bɔn ho afɔr: na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma no
